comment.author: 98338006@N00
comment._content:
in mijn arnhemse buurtje is een fiks omheind trapveldje, waar soms mountainbike-voetbal wordt gespeeld. Heel behendig, heel elegant eigenlijk en 100% stankloos ;-)
In my neighbourhood (in Arnhem, the Netherlands), I sometimes see mountainbike-soccer played. very agile, very elegant, completely stenchless:-)

comment.author: 23172002@N05
comment._content: Motorcycle football was a popular sport in Europe in the 20s and 30s.

comment.author: 33275007@N05
comment._content: what a nice capture. and what strange sport

comment.author: 85549406@N00
comment._content: The out-of-focus structure near the top right of the photograph is one of the water towers of the Crystal Palace so this photograph was probably taken at what is now Crystal Palace Park, 13 years before the Crystal Palace burned down (though the water tower survived).
